title: Aoyama Gosho Tanpenshuu
sinopse: 1-3. Tantei George no Minimini Daisakusen (Detective George's Mini Huge Cases) 4. Play It Again 5. Excalibur 6. Natsu no Santa Claus (Santa Claus of the Summer) 7. Chotto Mattete (Wait for A Little While) 8. Sunday 19 Show: Samayoeru Akai Chou (The Wandering Red Butterfly)
